title: No hate-speech, personal attacks, or harassment
content: Remember the human and be respectful of others. Hate-speech, personal attacks, harassment, witch-hunting, trolling and similar behavior is not allowed. Please be civil and do not use derogatory terms.

title: Spam
content: Submissions containing no real content or that are simply farming for e-mail addresses, will be removed

title: Keep posts and comments appropriate
content: Posts and comments should stay on the subject of internships and careers. Please avoid dicussions related to politics, religion or anything that is not on topic.
